Condition: shop IS NOT NULL or amenity='marketplace'
amenity='water_point' or pump is not null or man_made='well'
building='civic' OR amenity IN ('court_house','townhall') OR office='government' OR government IS NOT NULL
military IS NOT NULL or landuse='military'
aeroway IS NOT NULL OR building='aerodome'

key selections: name, man_made, tower, operator, communication:mobile, communication:radio

Condition: man_made IN ('water_tower', 'pumping_station') OR building='pumping_station' OR landuse='reservoir' or waterway='floodgate'
power IS NOT NULL OR building='power_plant'
waterway IS NOT NULL OR water IS NOT NULL OR natural IN ('water','bay')
